title: Extension to generate Cert-Manager resources
body:
### Description

From Dekorate 2.9.4 (unreleased yet), Dekorate will include a new module to generate the Cert-Manager artifacts (see https://dekorate.io/docs/cert-manager).
[Cert-Manager](https://cert-manager.io/) is an operator that generates certificates and issuers in Kubernetes/OpenShift.
Dekorate is already used by Quarkus to generate OpenShift and Kubernetes artifacts, so it would be great to have a new Quarkus Cert-Manager extension within the Quarkiverse to also generate the Cert-Manager artifacts.

Interested in this extension, please +1 via the emoji/reaction feature of GitHub (top right).


### Configuration suggestion

Dekorate Cert-Manager module is fully configurable via properties. The Quarkus Cert-Manager extension would look like this:

```
dekorate.certificate.secret-name=tls-secret
dekorate.certificate.self-signed.enabled=true
```

Additionally, this extension will also configure the Quarkus application to enable SSL transparently to users, so they don't need to do anything else apart from configuring the Quarkus Cert-Manager properties.
